page.title: 14CLUBS:PLAYGROUP:FLEET
page.content: {CHICKERELL MORNING NURSERY}IS HELD AT THE{CHURCH HALL.}IT STARTS AT 9:10 am UNTIL 11:45 am EVERY WEEKDAY EXEPT{ {FRIDAY}.IT COSTS 80p A MORNING.{BOYS} AND{GIRLS}AGED 2\ TO{SCHOOL}AGE ATTEND.THEY COME FROM THE NEARBY VILLAGES OF{FLEET}AND{LANGTON HERRING AS WELL AS{CHICKERELL}.{MRS SHAKEL}IS THE ORGANISER AND SHE HAS SEVERAL HELPERS.THE{CHILDREN}PLAY GAMES,PAINT, DRAW,MAKE SIMPLE MODELS AND SING SONGS AND NURSERY RHYMES.WHEN THEY ARE OLDER THEY LEARN TO WRITE THEIR NAMES.THEY HAVE MILK AND BISCUITS AT 10:30 am AND IN THE SUMMER MONTHS THEY PLAY IN A SMALL GARDEN AT THE BACK OF THE{HALL.}EVERY YEAR THEY HAVE A CHRISTMAS PARTY WITH ENTERTAINMENTS AND FATHER CHRISTMAS VISITS THEM.THIS IS PAID FOR BY SUMMER COFFEE MORNINGS AND OTHER FUND RAISING EVENTS.
